programme.title: Part 2

programme.title: Killings on Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E02, A family is torn apart by their grandparents' murders. Two decades later, a cold case detective takes on the case that has haunted him since he was a child--racing to solve it before the family takes matters into their own hands.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E23, When a woman is found murdered in her mobile home, police make two shocking discoveries--her husband may not only have been the killer, but he may have also killed his first wife 31 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E07, We follow Det. Vince Velazquez of Atlanta and Capt. Russell Popham of East Point, Ga., as they work to solve the 1995 rape and murder of 14-year-old Nacole Smith, one of Atlanta's most notorious unsolved crimes.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E05, College student Brad Perry shows up to work his graveyard shift at the gas station and is never seen alive again.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E18, A forensic scientist's painstaking examination of a rape kit helps solve the 15-year-old murder of a teenage girl. And when California investigators probe the murder of a 71-year-old man, they get help from the top suspect's former therapist.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Left for Dead / On the Case (#126)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E25, A detective in California tracks down a prostitute's killer with the help of a key piece of evidence. And two persistent cold case detectives use DNA to investigate the 1990 murder of a woman and the death of a man killed in a car crash in 1988.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E18, After 19 years, Kansas detectives reopen the case of a banker found beaten to death in his bed--and the chief suspect is his cheating wife. And a man with a guilty conscience helps Arkansas police to crack a cold case of murder.

programme.title: The Lost Patient
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E25, In 1979 Janie Landers disappears from a home for the impaired--the latest consequence of the facility's history of neglect. When Janie's body is found, there are many suspects but it is years before the killer is found.

programme.title: The Clock Strikes Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E16, When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years for advancements in forensic science to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: Murder In the Midwest
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E03, The body of Lori Nesson is found in a ditch in 1974, yet her death is not ruled a homicide. After four decades, the cause of death is changed to homicide, and the search begins for a killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E01, In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Diary Of A Serial Arsonist/The Lost Clue
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E10, A highly-regarded California arson investigator is suspected of setting a series of fires, and in Texas, a man is convicted of raping and murdering his 68-year-old neighbor.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Hitchhike To Murder / In The Care Of A Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E15, Police must wait nearly 30 years before advances in DNA technology give them the chance to convict the killer of a young hitchhiker, and Philadelphia police wage a 16-year hunt for the man who raped and killed a 10-year-old girl.

MST3K: Racket Girls, 19700101000000 +0000, A gym owner gets into trouble, becoming the target of the mob and the law. The 1950 short presents a high school couple rushing into marriage, and the marriage counselor who talks them out of it.
MST3K: The Batwoman, 20220819000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch a scantily-clad Mexican superhero take on a mad scientist and his aquatic super-soldiers in THE BATWOMAN (1968).

programme.title: Girl in Gold Boots
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E02, A girl from rural California goes to Los Angeles to work as a go-go dancer, but soon gets involved with drug dealers.

programme.title: The Wild Wild World of Batwoman
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Wild Wild World of Batwoman, S05E15, In this lower-than-low budget film, Batwoman enlists her band of go-go dancing Batgirls to protect the Atomic Hearing Aid from the rotten Rat Fink.
Film Crew: The Wild Women of Wongo, 20070911070000 +0000, Bob Honcho orders the Film Crew to provide a commentary track for the bizarre prehistoric adventure film, The Wild Women of Wongo (1958).

MST3K: Women Of The Prehistoric Planet, 19900220000000 +0000, Our intrepid hosts are trapped between Isaac Asimov's Literary Doomsday Device and Robert Ito from Quincy M.E. (1976) in a fur caveman outfit.

programme.title: Samson vs. The Vampire Women
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Samson vs. The Vampire Women, S06E25, While Mike and the Bots wrestle with Santo Versus the Vampire Women, TV's Frank is assumed into Second Banana Heaven, leaving no one for Dr. Forrester to kill.

programme.title: Hercules And The Captive Women
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules And The Captive Women, S04E12, The guys face off against Hercules once again as the strong man fights evil Queen Antinea to get his son back in Hercules and the Captive Women.

MST3K: Bride Of The Monster, 19930123000000 +0000, Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo, who conduct heinous experiments on human victims in an effort to create a race of atomic super-beings.

programme.title: Are You Ready for Marriage?
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E02, A high school senior named Sue and her boyfriend want to get married right after Sue graduates. A marriage counselor discourages the young couple from entering into a hasty marriage.

programme.title: Secrets, Lies and School Supplies
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Trace and the O'Briens attempt to put their own challenges aside.

programme.title: Pasts and Presents
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. Jess turns to her mother for help planning her cousins wedding.

Anne Tyler's Saint Maybe, 19981231000000 +0000, The story of a young man seeking forgiveness for his brother's death. Stars Mary Louise Parker and Blythe Danner. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

At Home in Mitford, 20170820000000 +0000, With a case of writer's block, a children's author escapes to small town Mitford for a change of scenery. She soon finds the heart and soul of the southern town in a priest as they work together to care for a young boy.

August Creek, 20170807000000 +0000, Erica (Courtney Ford) left her Iowa hometown after she lost her soldier husband, but three years later she returns for her sister's wedding and has to face the love she left behind.

Beverly Lewis' The Reckoning, 20151011000000 +0000, Shunned by the township she was raised in, a young Amish woman finds herself enjoying an affluent life in the secular world and engaged to a successful businessman. Until a long-lost love unexpectedly returns from her past.
Come Dance at My Wedding, 20090606000000 +0000, A woman (Brooke Nevin) faces opposition from her estranged father (John Schneider) when she plans to sell the family's dance studio.
Harvest Moon, 20151010000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A city girl travels to the country to try and fix up a struggling pumpkin farm.
J.L. Family Ranch, 20160101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Rancher and former sheriff John Landsburg must save his beloved family ranch.

Karen Kingsbury's A Time to Dance, 20160515000000 +0000, John and Abby were once the perfect couple. Now, after 21 years, they are about to lose it all. But when their daughter announces her engagement, they secretly agree to put their divorce plans on hold.

programme.title: Covenant
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E08, Alec Colson is claiming he has shocking proof that the government is covering up a liaison with aliens, and that Earth was almost destroyed by an alien invasion, Colson gives all nations involved 24 hours to come clean or he'll do it for them.

programme.title: Sacrifices
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E09, Teal'c and Bra'tac have just returned from the planet Ha'ktyl, where they tried to convince the warrior-woman rebel leader Ishta, to wait until her fellow insurgent Jaffa grow numerous enough to wage war against all the Goa'uld system lords at once.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E10, The Stargate is missing. Upon investigation the team notice a scientist tagging the stargate with a locator beacon. It looks like this is the work of The Trust taking whatever ruthless action they deem necessary to protect Earth from alien invaders.

programme.title: Gemini
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E11, An old IDC comes through; Send M.A.L.P. The M.A.L.P. telemetry shows that the person sending the transmission is Carter but Carter is in the control room at SGC. The Carter on the other side explains that she is a Replicator.

programme.title: Prometheus Unbound
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E12, A mission has been greenlit to take the Prometheus to the Pegasus galaxy. Jackson wants in. O'Neill feels he is too valuable to risk. The decision is overridden by the mission commander, none other than Gen. Hammond, now head of home world security.

programme.title: The Shrine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E06, On a flight back to Atlantis, McKay inexplicably falls ill. Fearing the worst, the doctor summons McKay’s sister to say her goodbyes. But Ronan tells Jeannie of a shrine that would grant Rodney one day to be himself again, before he dies.

programme.title: Whispers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E07, Dr. Beckett (Paul McGillion) is asked to delay his departure from Atlantis when word comes that Major Anne Teldy (Christina Cox) and her away team have stumbled onto one of Michael’s abandoned labs inside an extensive underground catacomb.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E08, Keller and the Atlantis team meet with the Wraith, Todd, to deliver a startling proposition. Keller believes she has found a cure for the Wraiths of their need to feed on humans but requires a test subject for this breakthrough treatment.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E09, McKay and Ronan volunteer to assist Dr. Jennifer Keller with a medical follow-up away from Atlantis. Later, when the pair return to her, they are surprised to learn that she left earlier but a search of the village turns up no sign of her.

programme.title: First Contact
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E10, Stargate SG-1’s Dr. Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) travels to Atlantis when his research suggests that a rebellious Ancient scientist named Janus (Gildart Jackson) may have hidden a secret lab somewhere within the city.

programme.title: The Lost Tribe
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E11, Jackson and McKay have reactivated the Attero device, an ancient machine designed to annihilate the Wraith. In doing so, they discover the reason the device was ultimately abandoned… Meanwhile, Todd continues to hold the Daedalus crew captive.

programme.title: Outsiders
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E12, Col. Sheppard and his team locate Dr. Carson Beckett on an alien planet where he is treating a small group of survivors of the Hoffan plague. But that same evening, a party of Wraith warriors arrives, threatening total annihilation.

programme.title: Inquisition
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E13, A newly formed galactic coalition extends an invitation to Lt. Col. John Sheppard and his team to represent Atlantis at their next meeting. But on arrival, the team is immediately detained and must stand trial for crimes against humanity.

programme.title: Light
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E05, With the Destiny still out of power, a plan is born to abandon the ship using the last working shuttle, in hopes that another planet will be habitable. But hope is short-lived when the only way to determine who will go and who will stay is a lottery.

programme.title: Water
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E06, Despite severe rationing and around-the-clock security, the water reserves onboard the Destiny continue to drop. Dr. Nicholas Rush has no explanation for this latest setback but, if they are to survive, they must find a new water source soon.

programme.title: Earth
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E07, With the situation onboard the Destiny dire, General O’Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and Homeworld Command order Col. Young to execute a high-risk plan concocted by the IOA scientists which, in theory, could return the crew to Earth.

programme.title: Time
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E08, After making a surprising discovery on a jungle planet, members of the team become ill. In an attempt to isolate the infection, the team sets up camp in the jungle. But when night falls, the illness will be the least of their worries.

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E03, Veteran lifeguard Jack 'JD' Darius has a dark secret in his past. He comes to Baywatch to throw his rescue can in the ring for the open Lieutenant slot, but young and ambitious Taylor Walsh also wants the job, and she's ready to fight for it.

programme.title: Memorial Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E04, Mitch, Sky, and April find a dead man on the ocean floor. Their search for answers to his demise leads to the retirement home where he lived, and his two friends who seem to be hiding the true story. The chemistry between Cody and Lani heats up.

programme.title: Charlie
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E05, April is devastated by her younger brother Charlie’s terminal illness. Mitch and Hobie want to make sure Charlie's wishes are granted, and that the time he spends with the lifeguards at Baywatch is the best of his life.

programme.title: Lifeguard Confidential
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E06, Caroline's acting career isn't going well so she returns to Baywatch to figure out what she really wants to do with her life. The lifeguards are plagued by a sleaze-ball helicopter reporter who somehow knows intimate details about their love lives.

programme.title: Out of the Blue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E07, After the devastation of the last big L.A. earthquake, Baywatch lifeguards are taking recent Seismic activity seriously. Caroline and JD 's tempestuous relationship heats up, forcing Caroline to make a critical decision that could change her life.

programme.title: El Niño
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E08, The hot Santa Ana winds blow an air of mystery to Baywatch when two sea lions perish in an unexplainable event. Mitch must uncover the cause to stop it from happening again. April is courted by Manny and Hobie, forcing her to choose between them.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E09, Donna tries to help Neely overcome her addiction to painkillers. Craig Pomeroy shows up at Baywatch to defend the legal rights of an elderly Native American shaman determined to initiate his tribe's traditional death ritual on the Baywatch beach.

programme.title: Missing
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E10, Cody ignores regulations and leaves his tower five minutes early to meet Lani for a hot date. Right after he leaves, a young woman goes swimming and is engulfed by a wave, never to reappear. Cody is tortured by the results of his negligence.

programme.title: Hijacked
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E11, Caroline's truck is hijacked by a young thief who forces her to drive him on a wild getaway chase. Neely reveals a shocking secret about her outrageous actions during her hiatus from Baywatch.

programme.title: No Way Out
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E12, Prejudice threatens Manny and April's relationship, driving April into Craig's comforting arms. An encounter with sharks leads Craig and April to take shelter in a water treatment plant's intake pipe where they encounter even more danger!

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E13, Mitch learns that a cache of US Marine weapons has been stolen and probably hidden offshore. Mitch and Cody locate a sunken vessel with the arms on board, but before they can confiscate them, they are taken captive.

programme.title: Surf City
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E14, After breaking up with Manny, April finds romance with Craig, who is having a mid-life crisis. While working together to catch a trio of wild men on waverunners harassing swimmers, Craig and April's passion heats up.

programme.title: To the Max
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E15, Mitch uses Hobie to initiate a relationship with Hobie's horseback riding instructor. Cody, JD, and Lani try to make extra cash in a scheme to collect Sea Urchins, but when another diver gets into trouble, Lani puts her life at risk to save him.

programme.title: Night of the Dolphin
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E16, Garner enlists Mitch’s help to track down and capture a ring of drug smugglers operating from a boat offshore. The stakes get deadly when Neely goes undercover to plant a bug and her cover is blown! Lani struggles to come to terms with her deafness.

programme.title: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E17, Cody makes a crazy bet with some local hotshots. Mitch risks his uncle's new Scarab in a wild race. Meanwhile, Neely and her baby daughter Ashley move in with Mitch for a couple of days sparking a twist to their relationship.

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E18, After a swimmer shows symptoms of a deadly virus, headquarters is quarantined, trapping Mitch, April, Donna, and JD inside with an annoying salesman. With JD waylaid, Newman takes on his plum assignment overseeing a photoshoot of sexy models.

programme.title: Diabolique
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E19, After he saves Neely's new nanny from a boating disaster, she develops a lethal attraction to Mitch. April and Manny join a charity contest arranged by Newmie for his juvenile diabetic nephew.
